reviews.review: Very fun but the ranking system is a bit broken :/

It is best game ever made.

Hunt: Showdown might be one of the best online shooters I have played. I'm not even sure where to start.
The game has great atmosphere. You can hear the creaking of the old wood barn, the rusty windmill slowly turning in the wind. It's even fun to play this game slow. To sit in a bush and wait for the enemy players and ambush them as they run by. 
The PVE works great. The variation of "infected" or "zombies" is verry creative and they pose a real threat if you dont play causiously. You can move trough them whilst making alot of noice, stealth kill them with throwing knives and byonettes or just simply throw a decoy to distract them. The possabilities are endless and they work.

You have to use the inviorment to locate the other hunters - players that is. Listen for starteld crows in the distance or the snapping of a branch behind you.
The different types of tools at your disposal varry from dynamite and firebombs to flareguns and barbed wire bombs.
My personal favorite is a so called "concertina bomb". A springloaded barbedwire bomb that you can use to block of entrenses or trap enemies or bosses. 
I highly recomend this game. Get it with a friend or play it solo, both alternatives works great!

Как всегда CS GO поражает своей непредсказуемостью рандомной стрельбы и неожиданными вылетами с карты ни с того ни с сего... Есть что-то, что не меняется с годами! Но все же я не могу сказать про нее что-то плохого....
Крайне не обычный шутер, в котором все зависит только от твоих скилов. Прямые руки и все! Графика конечно средняя, но по прежнему на уровне. Рекомендую для ознакомления!

Cs:Go:
Ein sehr cooles Spiel jedoch erst wenn man entweder Level 21 wird und dadurch Prime erhält oder sich Prime einfach kauft, denn erst dann hat man wirklich chancen ein Spiel zu gewinnen, da das Valve Anti Cheat wirklich schlecht ist!
Trozdem kann ich das Spiel weiter empfehlen und würde mir wünschen, dass mehr auf Regelbrecher geachtet wird (Nicht nur Cheating sondern auch Beleidigung, Rassismus, etc)
Shit game shit company suck my dick
